questions.question_text:
A consultant is configuring Einstein Forecasting to help the sales team predict how much they will sell by the end of a forecasting period.

Which two considerations should the consultant keep in mind to ensure that predictions are displayed? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
Opportunity Teams has nothign to do with this.

Selected Answer: BC
B. Enable Einstein Opportunity Insights is correct:
Einstein Opportunity Insights provides AI-driven recommendations and insights, including alerts when opportunities are at risk, such as when they are past the expected close date. This would automatically notify the sales rep about open opportunities that need attention.
C. Use Flow with a scheduled action and an email alert is correct:
Using Flow with a scheduled action allows you to automatically check for opportunities that remain open past the close date. The email alert action can notify the sales reps when the condition is met. This is an automated and flexible solution.

Selected Answer: AC
AC it is

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks wants to send a notification to sees reps when their opportunities remain open past the close date.

Which two solutions should the consultant recommend to meet the requirement?

choices.A: Add sales reps to the Opportunity Team.
choices.C: Use Flow with a scheduled action and an email alert.
choices.D: Instruct sales reps to follow their opportunities.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The Split View option in the ‘My Opportunities’ list view allows sales reps to see all of their opportunities in a list on one side, with the full details of the selected opportunity displayed on the other side. This provides easy access to all opportunities with minimal navigation and no need to open multiple tabs.

Selected Answer: C
C is it
